issue.title: z value ignored for BDI walk

content.raw:
[per thread](http://www.theroboticschallenge.org/forum/default.aspx?t=293):

BDI is still hard at work improving the behavior library, for use on the robot and in simulation.  We're expecting to see a new version of that library early next week, at which point we'll have to make the call on whether the benefits of the new functionality outweigh the risks of the late change.  We'll be asking for the teams' input on that question when the time comes.
content.html:
per thread:

BDI is still hard at work improving the behavior library, for use on the robot and in simulation. We're expecting to see a new version of that library early next week, at which point we'll have to make the call on whether the benefits of the new functionality outweigh the risks of the late change.  We'll be asking for the teams' input on that question when the time comes.
